name: A. Sum of Three
statement:
Monocarp has an integer n.He wants to represent his number as a sum of
three positive integers x, y, and z. Additionally, Monocarp wants none
of the numbers x, y, and z to be divisible by 3.Your task is to help
Monocarp to find any valid triplet of distinct positive integers x, y,
and z, or report that such a triplet does not exist.
